-- Anachronox --

Anachronox shrugs, "I see no reason why not." As he agrees to join 
the Tripredacus, the new techno-organic comes to a conclusion; 
Belthassan either had a part in his creation, or was his creator, and 
thus should be protected. "Anachronox will join the Belthassan and 
the Tripredacus."


--- In nbwrpg@y..., "warriorazure" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> Belthassan: Take it easy, friend. You are a new being in this 
> universe, it is normal. If you want, you can become one of us, a 
> Tripredacus. How do you feel? What do you think about this?
